tools.name: Get-DistributionGroupAudit
tools.description: Audits distribution groups for migration planning.

IncludeEmpty.description: Include groups with zero members. Default excludes them.

tools.name: Get-MailboxInventory
tools.description: Inventories all mailboxes with size, type, and migration-relevant details.

RecipientType.description: Filter by recipient type. Defaults to all mailbox types.

MinimumSizeGB.description: Only return mailboxes larger than this size. Useful for identifying large migrations.

tools.name: Get-MailFlowRuleExport
tools.description: Exports Exchange transport (mail flow) rules for migration review.

IncludeDisabled.description: Include disabled rules in the export.

tools.name: Get-PublicFolderAnalysis
tools.description: Analyzes public folders for migration to M365 Groups or shared mailboxes.

MaxDepth.description: Maximum folder hierarchy depth to report. Defaults to 5.

tools.name: Invoke-MigrationAssessment
tools.description: Runs a complete Exchange-to-M365 migration pre-assessment.

OutputPath.description: Directory for the HTML report and CSV exports. Defaults to .\Reports.

SkipPublicFolders.description: Skip the public folder analysis (useful if no public folders exist).

ExportCsv.description: Also export detailed data as CSV files alongside the HTML report.
